files.README.md:
# N64 Decompilation Skills

Skills to assist with Nintendo 64 game decompilation projects.

## Skills

- **n64-decomp** - Project setup with splat64, ninja build systems, libultra identification, compiler detection
- **n64-decomp-ido** - IDO compiler build configuration with asm-processor

## Installation

### Claude Code

```
/plugin marketplace add marijnvdwerf/agent-skills
/plugin install decomp-n64@marijnvdwerf-agent-skills
```

### Codex

```
$skill-installer install https://github.com/marijnvdwerf/agent-skills/tree/main/skills/n64-decomp
$skill-installer install https://github.com/marijnvdwerf/agent-skills/tree/main/skills/n64-decomp-ido
```

plugins.name: decomp-n64
plugins.description: N64 game decompilation workflow assistant for setting up projects with splat64, ninja build systems, libultra identification, and compiler configuration.
